widget.name: Lead generator
widget.description: This widget allows you to import data from the 2GIS directory by specified criteria. Form the basis of cool customers in the most minimal time.

errors.connection: Error connecting to www.lead4crm.ru server. Unable to retrieve user data. Refresh the page.
errors.empty_qty: You do not have any requests. For correct operation of the widget, replenish balance on the website www.lead4crm.ru.
